title: Get Early Access to the New Progress View!
description: We're excited to offer you an exclusive sneak peek of our brand new progress view, launching soon! Be among the first to explore the enhancements we've made, and help us refine the experience with your feedback. To make things as seamless as possible, you will be able to switch back and forth between the new and existing progress views with a single click. We'll reach out occasionally via email to hear your thoughts and suggestions.

elements.name: sign_up
elements.title: Are you interested in early access to our new Progress View? You will still be able to access the current progress table. We will reach out occasionally via email to ask for your feedback.
